fields.name: imagePickerAlt
fields.label: Alternative text for accessibility
fields.description: Write descriptive, concise, relevant alt text to describe the image in context, enhancing accessibility for visually impaired users and improving SEO.

fields.label: Don't provide an alternative text
fields.name: imagePickerAltHide
fields.description: Leave alt text empty for images that add no meaning or value. Marking them as decorative ensures assistive technologies ignore them.

fields.name: imageCaption
fields.label: Image Caption
fields.description: Write concise, clear captions that provide meaningful context for users. It should complement, not duplicate, the alt text.
